OOC: I'll be gone for a week.  I'm leaving my characters with Dachande.

::Aerotaur::
    "I hope he's okay.  It looked like he was hurt something awful."  He 
grimaces slightly and his left leg buckles.  "As soon as he's better we're 
going to attack the bad men who attacked us again."
